scenario_text.value: Finally... We did it!

That was some enemy...but you and Labramon
did a great job, Agumon!

This sort of thing’s no problem! Not if it’s
to save Aoi!

(The spiderwebs are vanishing before our
eyes. Is it because we beat Dokugumon?)

(The nest in the gym is disappearing, too.
Must be happening across the entire school.)
Ah! What about Aoi?!

You’re right! We can’t just be standing
around!
Takuma! Everyone’s fallen down!
Aoi’s out of the spiderweb!
I see, the webs disappeared, after all!

Right! We’d better hurry up and rescue our
friends!
You all right, Ryo?!
Mommy! Oh, Mommy—uhhh? Wait, I’m safe...?
Yeah, you’re safe now!
Uh, yeah... Thanks. I guess.

Heh heh, are those tears I see in your eyes,
Mr. Upperclassman?
Me? C-crying?! Yeah, right!

Desist with your chiding, Minoru. I am glad
Kunemon is safe, too.
Kew...!
Forget about him, what about Aoi?!
Takuma! Everyone’s fallen down!
Minoru! Are you okay?!
Man, I’m shaking like a leaf...

Thanks a bunch, Takuma. I could see you guys
fighting out there.

A coward like me can’t do a damn thing in the
real world, huh...

What’re you saying? I was barely hanging on
back there.

Hmph, pathetic. Don’t go causing trouble for
the rest of us!
The hell you say?!

Ho ho, such protests imply he was actually
concerned for our well-being.
As if!
Kewkew!
Indeed, we do apologize for making you worry.

Oh yeah, where’s Aoi?!
We have to save her!
Takuma! Everyone’s fallen down!
Minoru, Ryo! Are you guys okay?!
Man, I’m shaking like a leaf...
Uh, yeah... Thanks. I guess.
Everyone... I’m so happy you’re safe...
Indeed, we do apologize for making you worry.
Kew, kewww!
Yay, everyone’s just fine!
Aoi! Are you okay?!
Hey, she don’t look good. You think she’s...?

Enough yapping! You got time to talk, then
help us out here, man!
We’re coming, Aoi!
Hold on!
Kewww!
Aoi! Aoi! Say something!
Unnngh... Labramon? You... You saved me?

Thank you...so much... This is the second
time...

What’re you saying?! You saved me right
back, didn’t you?!

...Takuma, Agumon! Thank you for fighting
with me!

You rescued me, didn’t you, Takuma? Standing
up to such a frightening creature...

Thank you, truly... You’ve become so
reliable, haven’t you?

No, I couldn’t do it alone. Labramon and
Agumon were right there with me.

Agumon was amazing! That sudden spike in
power was just incredible.

Oh yeah, about that! That’s the second time
you’ve changed shape.
What the heck is that?
Oh! Yeah, I got no clue!
It’s like a superhero transformation...

Hmm, I wonder... Perhaps it’s more like
“evolution”!

A reaction to severe environmental changes...
That is, because of that vicious battle.

“Evolution,” huh... You have any idea how
you pulled that off, Agumon?
I really don’t! But if I had to guess...
Takuma’s feelings must have flowed into me!

I wanted to live up to Takuma’s feelings...
That’s what made me “evolve”!

So in other words, my willpower...? Can
strong feelings cause evolution?

Seems like the source of this power is the
bond you share. That makes you partners!
Partners... I like the sound of that!

Still...bonds of the heart... I can’t say
I get the logic, but I kinda understand.

Okay, should we get out of here? Everyone
must be exhausted.

That’s what I’m talking about! Let’s head
someplace we can take a breather.
